column21: Recruited through web ad, flyers, and email to Northeastern  & Tufts college mailing lists. Must be 18-45, right handed, in good health, and not taking any drugs
column22: After recruitment: 6 hrs (approx) behavioral testing (spread across 3 days) and 2 hrs of structural and fMRI. 20 sessions of training. Approx 6mo later training groups for follow up(avg 187 days with range 122-252)
column23: Adaptive dual n-back followed Jaeggi et al 2008.  Multiple object tracking followed genearl techniques from Alvarez & Franconeri (2007)
column26: Matched 2 training groups based on age, gender, & score on RAPM. Then each member of that group was randomly assigned to a training group.
